page.title: 12JUNIOR SCHOOL BOY
page.content: I was born in Ireland,I live in a house in Luton and go to{school}in St. Albans.I am eight years old.Every day except the weekend I get ready for school.Before the time to enter school we usually play football.Then I changed my shoes,put my lunch box in a box to be taken to the dining room.Then we had hymn practice.We were talking about two saints, John Fisher was one and I forget the other one. Then we went in to the classroom and did our spelling, then we started our diaries. I wrote three quarters of a page it was playtime.After playtime I did Nuffield Maths page 92. My Dad teaches in St.Albans and we have to {travel}in very busy traffic every day.If we get held up,or the car breaks down we are late. My name is Cormac Scanlon.My school St.Adrians.
